duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce, report, shoot, write, voice, edit and feed news production content for all platforms in a clear, engaging, and meaningful manner.
Arrange interviews with people who can provide information about stories.
Review and correct errors in content, grammar, and punctuation, following prescribed editorial style and formatting guidelines.
Research and analyze background information related to news stories to provide complete and accurate information.
Pitch stories to news managers and producers relevant to the local community.
Interact with viewers/users on social media sites.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Broadcast Journalism, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience.
